titles.title: No Taxpayer Funds for Illegal Immigrant Identity Cards Act
No Taxpayer Funds for Illegal Immigrant Identity Cards Act

A bill to prohibit the Secretary of Homeland Security from using Federal funds to establish the ICE Secure Docket Card program and to prohibit the use of documentation issued in connection with immigration proceedings to establish eligibility for Federal public benefits.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
